page.title: 04RELIGION IN SHAW 1985
page.content: In Shaw we have several Churches. St. James' Church does lots of services like weddings,funerals and christenings. There are bell ringing lessons and a youth club.They also have a Sunday School.A long time ago they built a church called St. Saviours' Mission Church because it was a long way to walk to St. James' if you lived up Buckstones Road.The vicar at St.James' and St.Saviours' is Mr. Bailey. At Wren's Nest there is a big place shaped like a wigwam.It is called St.Josephs'Social Club.On Sunday the Roman Catholic people go because it is also a church.Lots of people have wedding receptions and parties there.Shore Edge Methodist Church is just up the road from St.Saviours'.At Shore Edge they have a youth club and lots of services.
